title: Boutique Heritage Elegance in French Countryside with Renowned Golf Course & Destination Spa
description:
Escape the hustle and bustle of Paris and head south to the serene French countryside, where heritage charm awaits at this castle estate. Relax at the luxurious destination spa, tee off on the 18-hole golf course or savour exquisite French cuisine at Jacques Coeur while enjoying sweeping views of the historic grounds.

The hotel’s elegant rooms and suites, housed in buildings that still hold 17th-century grandeur, provide a tranquil retreat. Nestled among idyllic landscapes, the hotel is just a short drive from the magnificent Château de Fontainebleau, while for wine enthusiasts, the world-famous vineyards of the Loire Valley are within reach, offering a scenic journey through one of France's premier wine regions.
offer_address: Place du Château, 45330 Augerville La Rivière, France
